title: Daily Creation
prompt: A macro cinematic shot of a pulsating, semi-transparent biological heart-organism made of intricate bioluminescent glowing tendrils. Deep emerald green (#2D5A3D) and soft lime (#7FB069) liquid light pulses through translucent arterial veins. Golden yellow (#FFE66D) pollen-like particles float in a deep underwater void. Hyper-realistic, Unreal Engine 5, Octane Render, 8k, volumetric lighting, subsurface scattering on organic membranes, sharp focus on texture.
